snippet: Brazil great Ronaldo believes Luis Suarez biting an opponent was terrible for football at a World Cup of "wonderful surprises."...

headline.print_headline: Ronaldo: Suarez Bite Blight on Wonderful World Cup
headline.main: Ronaldo: Suarez Bite Blight on Wonderful World Cup

lead_paragraph: Brazil great Ronaldo believes Luis Suarez biting an opponent was terrible for football at a World Cup of "wonderful surprises."
